title: National Academy of Sciences members and foreign associates elected
text: The National Academy of Sciences announced today the election of 84 new members and 21 foreign associates in recognition of their distinguished and continuing achievements in original research.Those elected today bring the total number of active members to 2,290 and the total number of foreign associates to 475.
